EmailTemplate.name: 17-BG-SSE-Email-SSE CSD prod nurture-T00241.SSE_CSD_2_HR_Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: The 3 key elements of Diameter signaling
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Webinar Learn about deploying 4G LTE Diameter routing agents Diameter signaling traffic in your 4G LTE network is poised to grow rapidly because of the emergence of new devices, machines and applications. As a result, you might find yourself facing some new challenges, including:
- Increased signaling traffic volume - Greater topology complexity - Higher risk of internal and external threats to your network
Successfully overcoming the challenges will come down to three essential key elements – scalability, simplicity and security. In this Heavy Reading and Nokia webinar, find out how Diameter routing agents (DRAs) are evolving to manage control plane demands more effectively. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
